emuInput.TitMainTitle: Wrecked Chevy station wagon bent in half, parked in lot with other automobiles and fence, brick buildings with windows in background
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 21, 1963, pg. 3 reads: "Death Car - Three men died in above station wagon after the driver, resenting racial slurs by a white motorist, took off in pursuit across the 31st Street Bridge, smashed head-on into a car coming in the opposite direction and then smashed into a curb, police said. The vehicle immediately burst into flame. - Harris Photo."
